## Manufacturer Abbreviation
The abbreviation/variant found in MRO data:

**Example:** `PANDT`, `CUTLR-HMR`, `FXBRO`

## Canonical Name
What it should be normalized to:

**Example:** `PANDUIT`, `CUTLER-HAMMER`, `FOXBORO`

## Frequency
How often do you see this abbreviation?
- [ ] Very common (in most files)
- [ ] Common (weekly)
- [ ] Occasional (monthly)
- [ ] Rare

## Example Files
If you have example Excel files showing this abbreviation, mention them here (don't attach actual files with client data).

## Additional Context
Any other information about this manufacturer or abbreviation.
